title: Three Schools in the Alvord Unified School District Honored in Washington, D.C. as the Healthiest ...
text: ( Source : Kaiser Permanente ) RIVERSIDE, Calif. - Three schools in the Alvord Unified School District received top recognition for their impact in fighting childhood obesity. The local schools are among the 376 schools nationwide, honored by
